## encodeRGBM() function

Encodes a color value into RGBM format

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function encodeRGBM(scope: PBInsideFunctionScope, rgb: PBShaderExp, maxRange: PBShaderExp | number): PBShaderExp;
```
